Name: Grow Your Pets
About the game: Welcome to Grow Your Pets! This is a fantasy world of chill retro vibes! Here's some key game mechanics: Pet Growing System Every Pet has 3 stages that affect his appearance. You start with the first stage, and every 25th level Pet will evolve. Upgrade & Feeding System Your Pets are alive, so you'll have to feed them! They can be hungry and sad or well-fed and happy. There are 4 stats: strength, stamina, intelligence and luck. You can equip some trinkets and visual modification items on your Pet. Minigames Fish with your pet - he'll love that! The Forest Get ready to visit the Forest! Who knows, what's waiting for you there.. And some other features: Crafting & Inventory Collectables & Stats Trading system The primary storyline and daily quests Day & night cycle (and raining, of course!) And much more! We wish you to have a good time!
